data.password: Device Password (optional â€” enables video stream)

user.description:
Enter the IP address of your JetKVM device.

You must first SSH into the JetKVM and run the setup script:
wget --no-check-certificate -O /tmp/api-setup.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Poshy163/HomeAssistant-JetKVM/main/api-setup.sh && sh /tmp/api-setup.sh

To enable the live video stream, enter the JetKVM device password (the same one you use to log in to the web UI).
user.title: JetKVM Integration Setup

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the JetKVM API. Please SSH into your JetKVM and run: wget --no-check-certificate -O /tmp/api-setup.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Poshy163/HomeAssistant-JetKVM/main/api-setup.sh && sh /tmp/api-setup.sh
error.invalid_auth: Invalid JetKVM device password. Check the password you use to log in to the JetKVM web UI.

abort.already_configured: This JetKVM device is already configured.
